description: You may remember Clint from his tangle with Chaz in Hot Zone way back when and in Bi Barracks. Clint was a beautiful young man with the perfect complexion and a nice big cock to round things out. In this solo (his second solo ever) Clint really steps up to the plate to deliver the goods. His first ever solo was featured in Hung Heroes 3 and he was a lot more nervous in that solo than in the one I'm featuring for you tonight. Clint gives us one hell of a show in this solo with lots and lots of hot ass play. Once you watch this you'll wanna grab a copy of Hot Zone to watch that nice ass get devirginized. Enjoy!
title: Clint
